name: Facility Escape (gomaproi)
description:
You wake up in a facility, and somehow, you can split yourself and walk without your head, what they did to you?

Your goal is to collect the required amount of orbs, once you collect them, the exit door will open and you'll need to leave the facility before the time runs out.

Controls:
Z/Spacebar - Action
X/Enter - Split Yourself
Arrows/WASD - Move

Credits:
Art and Code by Gomaproi
Sound attributions shown in-game

This game was made for VimLark's game jam in only a week, and because of this, the game is not complete and doesn't have too many varieties of different levels.
